name: Grapple Game (Isaac Becker)
description:
Grapple Game was made for Low Effort Jam 13.  It was made by me, Isaac Becker, in about 2-3 hours.

There isn't much gameplay to be found here.  You are but a mere bean, swinging through a blue world, looking for answers.  But really, there is no objective.  Just swing around n' stuff.
